column4: Hi guys. This is my first time using ubuntu, I must say, it is pretty fast! :D
But I have a problem. I don't know what the default root password is. I don't have an ubuntu manual, and the wiki didn't help. Can anybody help me?
It wants me to type in the password for root.
if its not your machine  your not going to be able to and I'm not going to help you break into it
sudo -s. Lets you become root without the root password. I don't like it.
just make sure other users aren't in the sudoers file
This is most probably a dumb question, but how do I find out the root password from here?
Ah. Well, I'll have to set one...
